result.translation: Muvugishwamana! Mu vy’ukuri, Twarakweguriye impano y’ivyiza vyinshi nta ngere kw’isi no mu buzima bw’inyuma yo gupfa[1].
result.footnotes: [1] Muri ivyo vyiza, ni uruzi “Kawthar” ruri mu Bwami bw’ijuru, ku nkengera zarwo hari amahema yubatswe mu butare bw’agaciro “lulu”, umusenyi wo muri rwo, ni “miski”.
